thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1683
thread.title: anonymous

author: anonymous
title: anonymous
text: I have not departed yet, but I have booked my flight and that is the part in which FlightHub is involved. I was offered a fare far less expensive from FlightHub than the airline on which I was booked offered by booking directly with the ariline. The website was easier than most to navigate. The only disadvantage is that I was not able to book special services like arranging a special meal or checking an extra bag.
